name: Free Mission Control for OpenClaw AI Agents
description: Set up JARVIS Mission Control — a free, self-hosted task and coordination hub for OpenClaw AI agents. Fork the GitHub repo, run locally, or connect to MissionDeck.ai for a cloud dashboard without hosting anything.
author: Asif2BD
changelog: Remove shell execution patterns from install metadata (triggered ClawHub heuristic). Replace with link entries. Add explicit security notice in SKILL.md. Update SECURITY.md with full false-positive analysis and VT hash reference.
